content.rendered:
Germania Airlines Fluggesellschaft mbH, trading as Germania, is a privately owned German airline with its headquarters in Berlin. The airline was founded in April 1978.

Germania Airlines Baggage

Queries handled by Germania Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

List of Germania Airlines Offices:

 Armenia- Yerevan
 Austria- Wien
 Cyprus- Larnaka
 Czech Republic- Praha 
 France- Paris
 Greece- Athens
 Iraq- Sulaimaniyah
 Iraq- Erbil
 Iran- Tehran
 Israel- Tel Aviv
 Lebanon- Beirut
 Netherlands- Flughafen 
 Poland- Wroclaw
 Russia- Moscow
 Spain- Madrid
 Sweden- Uppsala
 Turkey- Istanbul 

 

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Germania Airlines Offices Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Germania Airlines Offices: (click on the stars below)
